## Technical Details
TLS 1.3 handshake process:
- ClientHello with supported groups and key shares
- ServerHello with selected cipher suite and server key share
- (EC)DHE key exchange ensuring forward secrecy
- Certificate verification using digital signatures
- Finished messages with HMAC verification
